description:
★ Featured on Apple's "Apps For Shopping" List ★ 

THE BEST DELIVERY TRACKER ON THE APP STORE
★ 180+ SUPPORTED PROVIDERS
★ ACCOUNT SYNC
★ PUSH NOTIFICATIONS
★ BARCODE SCANNING
★ SMART EMS TRACKING (combines origin and destination information)

Posted enables you to track your delivery parcels from many shipping & courier companies. Once you add in your tracking number, Posted will display all relevant details about your parcel so you know exactly what is happening with your latest purchase.

-----------------
FREE LITE VERSION:
Make sure Posted is right for you!
-----------------

Features:
--------------
★  Currently supports over 180+ delivery providers
★  Push notification when the status of your parcel changes
★  Estimated delivery dates (where supported)
★  Barcode scanning (3GS or newer).

--International Couriers
Aramex, CEVA, DHL, Fedex, iParcel, LBC Express, MSI, Purolator, TNT, Toll Global Express, UPS

--Europe
GLS, AsTrack, Ecoparcel

Bugs/Problems/News
----------------------
If you experience any problems please email help@postedapp.com

Follow on twitter: @postedapp

Disclaimer:
---------------
* Posted is not affiliated with any of the postal companies.
* Posted relies on the websites of the various companies for tracking information.
releaseNotes:
* Important Bug Fix: Location mapping working again.
* Added 7 new providers
* Other minor bug fixes

Added:
* Korea Post International (Korea)
* JNE Indonesia (Indonesia) 
* Fastway Ireland (Ireland)
* First Flight Couriers (India)
* Air21 (Philippines)
* Xend Express (Philippines)
* Yanwen Express (China)

Bonus feature for account sync users
------------------------------------------
Introducing the “web interface” to manage your parcels! Available at http://www.postedapp.com/members/login (FREE to use!). The web interface will be updated with more functionality in the future.
